input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeCorp, how may I help you today? Hello.. I am thinking of buying a shirt and I need it fast. How much do you charge for overnight shipping? I would happy to find the price for you. Are just curious about cost or do you need to place an order? just want to know the price We have different rates as it is based on weight. For items less than 5 pounds it would be 39.99 within the US. oh wow.. It is 54.99 for 10 pounds or less and 69.99 for all other items. ok.. good to know Is there any other questions for me today? I guess I will be using my old shirt instead That's all Thank you Your welcome. Thank you for contacting AcmeCorp, please be safe and stay well.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? I am thinking about getting a membership. What is the difference between the levels. Please give me one moment to look up for that information for you. Would you like to know the difference in benefits between the levels? Yes, I can't decide which level to get. Ok First, all members, regardless of level, are invited to the annual holiday extravaganza with open bar and free flights from anywhere within the US. Bronze members receive promo codes and savings on shipping fees. Silver members get everything included in Bronze, plus the ability to have agents make purchases and cancel orders anytime. Gold members get everything included in Bronze and Silver, plus unlimited refunds and much more flexibility on disputing transactions. What are the prices for each level? Membership can not be purchased directly. Membership levels are automatically granted when you make repeated purchases over a period of time. Bronze membership requires $500 worth of purchases in one year. Silver requires $1000 in one year. Gold requires $2000 in one year and answering a short questionnaire. Thank you, that helps answer my questions! That's all I needed! You are welcome. Thank you. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hey so I"m trying to figure out why I was charged an extra fee on my order Is anyone there? Sure, I can try to help with that. What's your full name? Great! My name is Norman Bouchard Thanks. Now, can you be a bit more specific about the fee? How is it appearing on your end? As a shipping fee? Something else? I'm not sure, that's what I can't figure out The jacket was $59, but there's extra fees on top of that $59 I see, that's pretty strange. Let me look into it a bit more. What are your account and order IDs please? My account ID is PGX68RWNYP and my order ID is 3248190829 Thank you. What's your membership level Norman? bronze Thanks for that. It looks like some kind of processing fee that has been tacked onto orders made since the middle of March when stay-at-home orders began being issued in the U.S. Oh okay, so there's no way to get that reversed then? I know, given the circumstances, that no one wants to pay more for their items. But, we have to collect the extra fees to compensate our workers for hazard pay, make up for shortages along our supply chain, et c. Unfortunately, no. There's nothing I will be able to do. Is there anything else I can help you with? That was it, thanks for the thorough explanation there. You're so welcome. I hope you continue to do business with us. Yes I will, thanks again I appreciate you reaching out, and hope you have a great day.

Albert, may I ask how you learned about this issue? It may have been via email, your spouse, or on the news? My spouse actually mentioned it Thank you! target: pull up the costumer account [david williams]; verify costumer identity [david williams, a8psofbm8r, 1651723669]; get shipping status [delivered]; offer refund [183]; check membership level [bronze]
input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting AcmeBrands! How can I help you today? Hi! I was hopping to manage my shipping details because we have moved to a new address I would like to cancel the order placed No problem, I can help you with that. Could you provide me with your name and order ID? David Williams Order ID: 1651723669 Thank you. To clarify, you want to cancel an order and not update the shipping address? Yes. I apologize I would like to cancel the order I ordered the wrong item by accident. I dont know what i was thinking Okay. What is your account ID? Account ID: A8PSOFBM8R I understand. What is the shipping status of your order? Delivered What is your membership level with us? bronze Since your a Bronze member, I can give you a refund immediately and when you receive the item you can contact us again for a shipping label for the return. Thank you I appreciate it No problem. What was the items you'll be returning? You can just give me the total. input: Dialogue: Hi! Thank you for contacting AcmeCorp. How can I help you today? I bought some jeans from you and I got a really bad grass stain in them. I wondered if you had any idea how to remove that? Yes, Let me look that up for you Sorry, I haven't bought the jeans yet. I was looking at them but my son always gets bad stains in them. I don't want to buy them without knowing if it will come out. While the grass stain is still fresh, take a household sponge and soak in vinegar and lightly dab the stained area.  Dry with a paper towel and repeat the treatment as needed until the stain comes up Then turn the jeans inside out and wash as usual Generally wash cycle should be on the cold water setting Oh, that doesn't sound too tough. Thanks You are welcome Any other questions today? No, thanks Thank you for contacting us today! Have a great day!

To confirm: were you concerned about your premium subscription being mistakenly removed from your account? Or were you inquiring about missing credits from your account? missing credits with my account, $40 Sure thing. Are you aware with where your credits would have originated from? It may have been a subscription refund, a previous purchase, or a promotional package? promotional Thank you, Norman. I will query the system now to see about your missing credits. One moment, please! ok Good news! It looks like you may be seeing a temporary issue in our customer interface. Would you please try logging out and in again? Your credits should appear in your account momentarily. yes let me try oh yes, there they are! Wonderful! Is there anything more I may help you with today? thank you very muc! that is all! much Thank you so much for contacting AcmeBrands customer service. Goodbye!

input: Dialogue: Hi, Welcome to customer care unit How may I help you today? Hi, I need to check the status of my account.  I'm missing some credit. hello? I'm sorry for the inconvenience Please f=give me your full name or account id My name is Norman Bouchard.  I don't have my account ID right now. I should have a $40 credit from a subscription refund, but I do not show it in my account. I'm looking into this issue Where did the credit originate from? I had a subscription refund Is that refund showing the $40.00 I just checked and I can see that the credit is not missing. The problem is with the interface Ok, so what does that mean? How do I access the refund? Try this option, logout of your account and log in again ok, hang on ill try that The credit is still in your account, there is no need for a refund I can see the credit in your account Ok, so will it just be credited to my next order then? Do I have to do something special to access it? You don't need to take any special action. All you need to do is to logout and login, you will see the credit in your account balance ok great, I did that and see it now!  Thanks for your help You are welcome Would that be all for today? yes that's all I needed. Ok. Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Good afternoon, how can I help you today? I've been waiting for your annual sale to replace my winter coat and get some new boots.   Can you tell me when the sale will be? Sure, let me pull up the information on our annual sale for you. The annual sale starts the last week of January. It lasts a week. You can also subscribe to our newsletter and you will get a reminder! how do I do that?    I really do not want to miss getting new boots. It's easy. Just go to our website and on the top right hand corner you will see a button "subscribe to newsletter". Click that and it will ask you for some information. Sounds easy enough. Is there anything else I can help  you with today? No.   Just found the button and I'm subscribing now. Great! Have a great day and enjoy those boots when you get them!

input: Dialogue: Hello! Thank you for shopping with AcmeBrands. How may I assist you? Greetings! I was wondering if I could get a refund on a pair of Michael Kors jeans I bought I'll be glad to help you with that. May I get your full name, please? My name is Crystal Minh Thank you, Crystal. May I ask the reason for the refund, please? I don't like the way the jeans look after all I would like ti refunded before it ships Hello? Thank you Crystal, I will make a note of it now. To continue assisting you, may I please get your Account ID and Order ID? Sure My account ID is ISHR1U7DNK The order id is 3362001610 Thank you, Crystal. To validate your purchase, may I please get your Username, Email Address, and Order ID? Yes My user name is crystalm461 The email address is crystalm461@email.com I gave you the order id of 3362001610 Perfect, thank you! May I ask how you would like to receive your refund? Can I have the money back on my debit card? We can issue a gift card, credit your account, mail out a paper check, or refund your credit card on file. Refunds to debit cards are not available at this time. Okay, please credit my account then That works fine Thank you And Crystal, what is the dollar amount for the refund you're requesting, please? It is $59 Anything else? You're all set! $59 has been credited back to your account. Is there anything more I may help you with today? Okay, that's great! That is all I needed Thank you so much for contacting AcmeBrands customer service. Goodbye!

input: Dialogue: Hi, thanks for shopping with us! What can I help you with today? The website is so slow! I'm trying to shop but I can't get anything to load. I'm sorry, I'm sure that's frustrating! I can help walk you through some steps that might help it run faster. First, try logging out of your account and back in again. Okay. I did that, it's still slow : ( Can you try closing all the other tabs in your browser, as well as anything running in the background? Okay will do Still lagging, won't load images. Hmm, are other websites running smoothly? Yes they seem to be. I'm sorry for this, I'm not sure what is wrong with our website! I will send a message to our website team so they can work on it. In the meantime, I can make the purchase for you if you'd like. Okay, thanks. I'd like to order the Tommy Hilfiger jeans, they are $99. Great, I can get that set up for you! What is your credit card number and expiration date? 4523 5688 4567 3333 exp 12/23 Thank you, those jeans should ship out shortly! Again, I apologize for the inconvenience! Is there anything else I can do for you today? that's everything! Ok, you have a great day!

Alright, next could you try logging out and back in to your account to see if that clears anything up then try again? just a minute nope still rejected Ok. target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how remove a paint stain]
input: Dialogue: Hello, Thank you for contacting AcmeBrand. How may I help you? hello i am thinking about buying this tommy hilfiger boots I am a painter so I want to know how to remove a paint stain from the boots if I get paint on them I'll happily provide you with that information. One moment please. Theres a few steps needed for removing paint stains from the boots but theyre all pretty simple. First you'll want to brush off any excess paint, then with a caorse brush or even a toothbrush flake off dried excess paint. After that apply a mixture of soap and water to soften up the stain and scrape off any leftover softened paint. After this rub the spot a bit with a detergent and water mixture. Lastly you'll just apply some nail polish remove to the affected area and let it dry. the boots will look good as new! so complicated. I will just use a paint remover from Footlocker. thank you for your help though. Haha, I completely understand. This is just the recommended way to keep them nice and looking as new as possible. Did you need anything else? no, that was all Thank you and have a great day! you too. bye

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme Brands! How can I help you today? Hi. I was wondering if you could tell me how much overnight shipping is? Yes, I can help you with that. Can I have your name? Chloe Zhang Chloe, give me one moment while I provide you with the shipping information. I'm having a Zoom happy hour tomorrow and was really hoping for a new outfit for it! The price of overnight shipping is based on the weight of your product. For continental US customers, it's $39.99 for items 5 pounds or less, $54.99 for 10 pounds or less and $69.99 for all others. For Hawaii and Alaska, the price is $10 higher per weight category. We do not ship outside of the US. Yikes, that is pretty pricey. Maybe I don't care about virtual happy hours that much. Thanks for the information though! You're welcome. I hope you still have a great time during happy hour. Is there anything else I can help with? That was all today, thanks Alright, you have a wonderful day! You too!

input: Dialogue: Hello and thank you for waiting. How may I help you this afternoon? I ordered a jacket and it's the wrong size.  I need to see about returning it I can assist you with that. Username: jwu95941 Email Address: jwu95941@email.com Order ID: 4679286756 Thank you, I have pulled up the transaction. Could you tell me what your membership level is? Silve silver Great. Ane when was the purchase made? 09/24/2019 Unfortunately at your current membership level you have a six month limit on returns, so this transaction has expired. So there's nothing that can be done? I am afraid it cannot be returned. However, I can ask the purchasing team to contact you about exchanging it for the correct size. Would you like me to go ahead and do that? My name is Norman Bouchard I'm happy to pay extra for the over night shipping Okay I also need your acocunt ID and order ID Account # XG2BZIQPK XG2BZIQPKA and order number is  1895109060 I am able to purchase this jacket elsewhere if you're not able to ship overnight WHat is the shipping status? Shipping Status: Order Received So I don't think it's left your warehouse yet please cancel the order if you cannot overnight it to me. I am still looking into it What is your membership level? I can probably stop payment on my credit card if you are not able to overnight it Member Level: Silver I have been an excellent customer over the years, and you have always been there for me Okay I can do this, the charge is 20, would you like me to move forward with this?> and I hope you will be again, in the instance. YES! Thank you so much! I really appreciate this - especially because I love this jacket so much! and my event tomorrow night will be in a very cold snowy place That is great news!! input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrand. How may I help you? Hi. I was going to purchase an item on your website, but then I realized it is WAY overpriced compared to other places selling the same item. So, I was wondering why there is such a big discrepancy. I;m sorry to hear that. Let me look into the pricing for you. Could you give me your full name please? I'm Rodriguez Domingo Thank you Rodriguez. I was able to pull up your account. Could I also please have your Account ID and order ID? Yep. My account ID is MCYEWLADRS And the order ID should be 6731496084 One moment Great everything looks good there. Our pricing is determined by an algorithm that monitors the prices of items current.y rather than done by hand so sometimes the prices can jump up or down by amounts more than normal. I'm sorry for any incovenience this may have caused. But this seems to be an exorbitant price compared to other competitors. Is there any way you can price match what they are offering? Again I'm sorry. I can provide you with a promo code for the price match. Would that promo code be significant or like a 2% reduction in the price In this case it'll be 20% off. Okay that sounds reasonable. Could you please do that for me. Sure thign one moment. Alright your promo code is A21GD Was there anything else I could do for you today? Do I just use it when I am making the purchase - like at check out? Yes, you'll simply enter that code in the "promo code" box at checkout Okay great. Thanks No problem. have a great day!

Thank you, it was $69 I understand goof ups happen from time to time. input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I help you today? I was doing some shopping and came across something I might want to buy, but I wanted a little more info. Sure I can help, what kind of information did you need? Well I wanted to know about removing gum from the sole of these boots I want to buy. I've issues with that in the past. You can use a dull knife to smear peanut butter over the gum. Wait 15 minutes and the gum should fuse with the peanut butter. Then you can scrape it off and clean the area with soap and water. If that answers your question, I'll ask if there's anything else I can help with. I need to make a note of that. That pretty much answers all my questions Thanks for everything I think I'll end up buying them. No problem, is that all you need? Yeah that's it thanks again

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting AcmeBrands! How can I help you today? Hi, I am interested in purchasing some Calvin Klein jeans, and was wondering if they shrink after washing? I'd be happy to find that information for you, but first could you provide your name? Crytal Minh Crystal, our jeans will not shrink if properly cleaned. Fold them inside out when washing to preserve the color and use cold water. It's best to hang dry but using a normal dryer can also work. Awesome! I will definitely buy a pair. Thanks for your insight. You're welcome. Can I help you with anything else today? No thank you Great! Enjoy the rest of your day!

US Bronze members also save on shipping and get access to promo codes. Open bar! Count me in lol I know, right! But wait, there's more! input: Dialogue: hello, how may i help you today? How do I remove grass stains from my jeans? If i understand correctly, you wish to know some specific info on our jeans, specifically removing grass stains? Yes!  Tommy Hilfiger $89 jeans! Understood, may I have your name please? Alessandro Phoenix I can definitely find the answer for you today Alessandro one moment while I search our database I have found the info You will want to take a sponge soaked in white vinegar that is undiluted (not mixed with anything else) then dab lightly where the stain is dry the spot with paper towels, and repeat these steps until the stain is gone if you wish to preserve the color of your jeans, be sure to wash them inside out, on the cold water setting, as an aside Thank you! Have a great day! Is there anything else i can do for you? Thats all thanks! have a nice day!

input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting Acme.  How may I help? Hello, I would like to check the status of my account as I read an email saying my subscription was removed but I do not want it removed Okay, I can definitely check that out for you, and we can probably clear this up right away May I just gather some information from you first, to verify the account details? Sure May I ask your full name, or your account ID? Crystal Minh Thanks, Ms. Minh and it looks like that email was legitimate, a service was indeed removed from your account.  Very sorry about that, but since it was a problem on our end, I can reinstate that for you right away That would be great thank you Okay, that should be straightened out now.  If you check on your account page, you should see that everything is now active and up to date. Thanks so much Again, sorry about that mix-up. target: pull up the costumer account [sanya afzal]; notify team [purchasing department]
input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? I really hope someone can help me Every time I search on this site, everything is always out of stock! I am so sorry to hear that. Let me look into that for you. This has got me at my wit's end.  Can't I just give you my money like a normal person?! Are you looking for a particular item? I was hoping for the $54 Michael Kors boots, but if I see one more thing sold out, I'm just going to take my chances at Goodwill! So you are seeing multiple items out of stock or only the boots? about 9 out of 10 random things I've searched for have all been out of stock You did have a surprising abundance of Lee Carvello Putting-Green Shoes, but those are too expensive Can I please have your full name or account ID? Sanya Afzal is the name.  I'm shopping as a guest, so there is no account iD I will write up and report and notify the purchasing department so that we can have your items in stock as soon as possible. I sure hope so Has this solved your issue? That seems to be the best I could hope for Is there anything else I can help you with today? No that'll do it for me Thank you. Have a great day!

Are you interested in the benefits associated with the various levels? I am specifically trying to determine which level would suite me best as I will be purchasing a lot of product I will be donating a cetain amount evey month so maybe their is a benefit to ordering more? I can definitely help you with that. Let me go ahead and outline the benefits for you. Thank you If you have a Bronze membership, you save on shipping fees and get extra savings with promo codes. Silver members get the previous perks, and can also have agents make purchases for them and can cancel orders anytime. Gold members get unlimited refunds and get benefit of the doubt in all transactions in addition to the previous perks. Thank you so much, I will consider these If you're interested in making a lot of purchases, you would be able to save a lot on shipping with Bronze. input: Dialogue: Hi there, how can I help you today? I wanted to purchase a product but I wanted to know a little more about it before I buy it. I'd love to help you with this. What were you wanting to know today? It is a Guess shirt and it is $64. I wanted to know if it is breatheable because I have a skin condition and my skin breaks out when I wear tight conforming clothes or clothes made with inferior fabrics. Let me look that up and see what I can find. May I ask who I am speaking with today? My name is David Williams David, our shirts are made of 100% natural fibers such as cotton, linen, wool or a blend of these. The most popular blend is 90% cotton and 10% linen. The label on the collar will tell you what material is used. Ah that is perfect. I would also like to know how to ash the shirt. You could always order one and wee if it bothers you and return it if it doesn't work for you. Is there any instructions? That's a good idea, maybe I'll try that. You can throw it in the washer with your other clothes and was as you normally would. It is recommended to use color guard with bleach to preserve the color. Drying should be on permanent press if possible, but it is not required. Is there anything else you needed to know today? No I think you answered my questions. Thank you! Thanks David, enjoy your weekend.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you? Hi! Can you tell me about the return policy? I was thinking of buying a few things, but I want to make sure that I can return them if they don't fit. Sure The policy on returns depends on your membership level. Gold members are allowed unlimited returns. Silver members are allowed returns for purchases made in the last 6 months. Bronze members are allowed returns for purchases made in the last 90 days. All other membrs are allowed returns for purchases made in the last 30 days. Is there anything else I can help you with? Awesome! That's great. Thank you for your help. That's all. Have a great day!

First, all members are invited to our annual holiday extravaganza - which has an open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US! You also save on shipping and get promo codes at the Bronze level At silver we can make purchases for you and cancel your order at any time, plus all the bronze benefits. For gold you get unlimited refunds and are always given the benefit of the doubt in transastions. Was there anything else I could help you with? Are there just 3 levels? yes, bronze, silver and gold. Any other questions? that answers my question, thank you you're welcome, have a good day!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? Hi there. I purchased a pair of jeans for a friend's birthday, but I need to return them because they are the wrong size. Okay, I should be able to help you with that may I ask your full name and, to verify your account details, your username, email address and the Order ID? Sure. My full name is Crystal Minh and my username is cm748362. The email address on file should be cm748362@email.com and the order ID is 4997271052 okay, we should be able to process a return for you.  May I ask your membership level? Sure thing. I have a silver membership. Excellent.  So for a valued member such as yourself, you can return any item that was purchased in the last 6 months, or at any time if you still have a receipt or the original packaging Ok perfect. I do still have the receipt for the item That's good.  Would you like to return your item in store, at a drop-off center, or would you prefer that I send you a shipping label so that you can send the package back to us? It would probably be most convenient if you could send me a shipping label Okay.  May I just confirm your address, and then I'll send that right out Yes. My address is 1593 Lincoln Ave  San Mateo, NY 15562 Okay, you should be all set for now.  Is there anything else I could help with while we're here? No that's everything! I appreciate your help I'm glad I could help.  Have a great day, Ms Minh You too!

input: Dialogue: Hi, how may I help you? Hello. Can you help me with an issue with your website? Sure, what is it? I just got a new computer, so maybe the issue is on my side But when I try to search for things on the site, all I see is a spinning wheel This is so frustrating! I can't search for anything I see, let's try a few different things to fix it. Could you try logging in and out and then searching? Yes I'll do that Hmmmm....that didn't fix the problem I still see the wheel I see, could you try clearing the cookies? Going into 'More Details' in your browser will give you the option. Yeah I know how to clear cookies Let me try I just cleared them. Unfortunately, the wheel is still there and I can't search I see, I have notified the team of your issue. We can try one more thing to fix the problem, if not I can try to fix it manually. Okay Could you try searching for a different item? And then the original one again. Sure thing Okay, that worked! I don't understand why, but the search is functioning normally now Thanks so much! Great! So glad, anything else today? No, that was it Have a great day! Thanks for fixing this!

While I pull that up, can you please tell me your account ID and order ID so that I can verify your identity? Account ID: OUWPL9HLGK | Order ID: 3823300178 Got it, thanks! What is the shipping status of your item? In Transit Okay, and what is your membership level? Guest Unfortunately, because it is in transit and you have a guest membership, I am unable to change it, because it is too late in the shipping process. I'm very sorry. Is there anything else that I can help you with, though? No that is everything, thank you for help You're welcome, have a great day!

input: Dialogue: hi, how can I help? Hi, I'm trying to do some shopping, but the website is running really slow Glacially slow, even.  Is there an outage today? ok, let;s try a few things I am sorry for the trouble. First, have you tried loading any other pages? That's okay.  Everything else seems to work for me, including this site, so I think it might be a problem in the servers (Yes, other pages are working) OK. And, success! is there anything else? No, that was everything.  Thanks have a good one!

Norman Bouchard Just one moment, Mr. Bouchard. I'll also need your Account ID and Order ID, if those are available. AA8YVINRMD 6267680869 Thanks. input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting Acmebrands, how can I help you? Hi. I have to return an item I recently purchased. It had a stain on it when it arrived. Oh, sorry to hear that. I'd be glad to help you get that done though. Can I get your full name and account ID please? Yeah no problem. Alessandro Phoenix. Is my account ID my username? No, it would be different than your username, but we may not need it. I was able to pull up your account with your name. Can I get your username please? Oh ok great. Yeah, my username is alessandrophoenix976 Thanks. Can I get your e-mail address and the order ID for your order as well please? alessandrophoenix976@email.com Order ID: 2833815088 Thank you. Do you happen to know what your membership level is? We have Bronze, Silver, and Gold. Yeah definitely. It's Gold. Great. Thanks. Ok, since you are Gold level, we can accept that return. Can I get your address? Oh wow, so ifI wasn't Gold, I wouldn't be allowed to return? Address: 0634 Brushwick Dr  Baltimore, MI 93700 Well, since you are Gold, you get unlimited returns. The other membership levels have certain restrictions, like the purchase has to be within a certain time frame, etc. Ah gotcha. That makes sense. How would you like to process your return? You can choose by mail, taking it to a store location, or drop off at a shipment center. I'll drop it off Ok, one second. Ok, you're all set. Sorry for the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can help you out with today? Nope. That's it. Thanks! No problem, happy to help! Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello!  I was charged for an item that definitely did not buy! It's not even my style. Hello, I'm very sorry to hear that. Let me help you resolve this. Can I have your full name or account ID? David Williams - dw443296 It seems our company made a mistake with your order. I'm very sorry. Are you a gold or silver member? I am not Can you tell me what the item is that you did not order A Tommy Hilfiger shirt. Blue with red and white stripe in the middle. Do you have an Order ID or username? I have both. Order ID is 3469907546 Username is dw443296 Can I have your email address as well? dw443296@email.com Thank you. You're welcome! How would you like your refund? There are a few options. A prepaid gift card is one. Adding the value back to your account is another. I can send you a paper check or refund your credit card as well. Please refund my credit card. Absolutely. I'll need to know your credit card number. Hmm, can't you just refund the used payment?  I don't really feel comfortable putting my CC number on a chat box. The way the system works requires I input the card for validation. What was the date of the purchase? I am not sure because I didn't actually make the purchase. Was it your card used in the purchase? Yes, nevermind.  Just give me a prepaid gift card please. I'll need to know your address to mail the card. 9429 Kennedy St Brighton, MI 59609 How would you like to return the item, by mail, in store, or the drop off center? If I ever get it I will drop it off in store. Only reason I knew about the purchase was because of an email.  Hopefully it hasn't already shipped. I can check that for you now. Thank you. Can you tell me how much the item cost? 99 The $99 gift card will be sent to your address. Thank you. Can I help you with anything else? That will do it.  Thank you. Thank you for being a customer. Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Hi how can I help you hello I was wondering how long my premium membership is good for? OK General inquiry about membership or do you have a membership and want to know status? Well, I am a bronze member so how long will that last?  Membership lasts for the remainder of the calendar year when you received it and the next full calendar year. It is calculated at the beginning of each month.  For example, if you spent $501 on June 15th, then you will become a bronze member starting July 1st. It will last until December 31st, the following year. Boost to the next level also occurs the same way. Does that help? Yes, time to buy gifts! Anything else? no I am good. Be well. Have a nice day

input: Dialogue: Hi, how are you doing today? Hi, I am doing fine thank you What can I help you with? my credit card keep getting rejected at your store for some reason, it works at other places I'm sorry! I can go ahead and make the purchase for you. What is the item you would like? Product: Shirt Brand: Tommy_Hilfiger Amount: $59 I don't want you to make the purchase for me though Thank you, and what is your credit card number and expiration date? No, my supervisor is unavailable. I think you may have cost your store not just a purchase but a customer for a long term What do you mean I'd like you? you make no sense Well we are sorry to lose you. You have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, what can I do for you today? I believe I was incorrectly charged for shipping Okay, in what way do you mean? it was higher then expected Okay give me a moment and let me see what I can do Are you looking for a refund or would you like to slow your shipping to reduce the charges? I wantted to have it waived but atleast reduced Okay, can I have your full name? Alessandro Phoenix And your username, email, and order ID? aphoenix481@email.com 6411871709 aphoenix481 Okay, what's the shipping status of your order? In Transit Would you like us to cancel the order then? cancel it and make it take longer so it's cheaper Well if that's the case, give me a moment. I asked you if you'd like that near the start, and we should be able to do it without cancelling the order, but I'd have liked to know that sooner. Can I have your account ID? QPUANR9MIY i did say reduced, I can't know exactly what you need sorry. What's your membership level? Silver Okay, since it's already In Transit I can't slow the shipping, but since you're silver I can refund the fees as a credit to your account. thanks have a good day Is that all I can do for you? yes, thanks for the help Then have a good day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? The item I want is out of stock.  When will you have it? I can check on that for you, first can you send me your account ID? Michael Kors jacket, for $54 Ok I've logged that particular product as being out of stock. I'll send a report to the Purchasing Department right now to make sure that they restock that jacket immediately. did you get my right username?  it's rodriguezdomingo861 thanks. any idea when? Oh I'm sorry about that, I must be looking at the account for a different customer. Let me go into your account so I can make a note to put one of the jackets on hold for you. It usually takes 2-3 business days between when an order is placed and the items appear on the shelf. You should be able to order one on back order tomorrow so it will be sent to you as soon as we receive them. okay, thanks Sure thing, is there anything else I can help with? that's all Great, have a nice day!

May I also have your Account ID and your Order ID so that I can access your account details? Sure. My Account ID: FZRUKCRLAK and the Order ID: 5664641541 Just a second while I look up your subscription status. Your account is currently active, but there is a payment of $14 due today. Oh awesome. Can I just go ahead and pay that balance? Of course, While I'm doing that here is a link for you to look up your account directly, you'll just need your username to access your account. Do you have your Username? Perfect. Thank you so much! I do not have my username. No problem, your username is jwu1. Oh man. How could I forget that? Hah! I forget my own name every day!I've made that payment on your account and your subscription is active and up to date. Thank you so much for getting that status information for me. That was extremely helpful! Is there anything else that I can help you with today? That was it. Thank you! Thanks for shopping with Acme. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hi, what can I do for you? Hi! I just signed up for premium subscription service. Do I need to spend certain amount of money to keep my subscription? You do need to spend a certain amount through purchases at our store. In the last year if you've spent $500 or more you get Bronze, $1000 or more and you get silver, and if you spend $2000 or more you get gold. What are the differences between silver and gold. Right now I have bronze Bronze only gets the savings on shipping fees and promo codes. Silver can cancel orders at any time and have an agent make purchases for them. Finally, gold members can make as many refunds as they want and are trusted more. Before I let you go, would you say you were more interested in the pricing or the benefits? pricing Okay, anything else? That will be all Thanks and have a good day! Thanks. great information!

input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I help you today? Hello, my name is Norman Bouchard and I would like to know how I can detach the hood from my Tommy Hilfiger jacket Hi Mr Bouchard, I can help you with that today Give me one moment please Ok, to detach the hood will be pretty simple. I see First you will need to find the five buttons on the collar of your jacket. Okay These connect your hood to the jacket You just need to unbutton those 5 buttons and the hood will detach Excellent I would like to know if there are any hidden zippers as well? Ok, one moment please you want to know if there are hidden zippers on the same jacket, correct? Yes Can you tell me if there are? Yes, there are no hidden zippers on the tommy Hilfiger jacket Is there anything else I can help you with? That is all You have answered all my questions Thank you! Ok great, your welcome! Have a great day You as well!

I will do my best to resolve your issue. It had two shirts and a pair of boots in the ordrer Can I please have your full name, account ID, and order ID? Alessandro Phoenix OYCXMGLFGY 8053594358 Did you receive any email notifications from us? Two days ago, it said it was arriving yesterday Ok, let me look into your order and see if anything is wrong. Can I please have your username and email address? aphoenix690 aphoenix690@email.com Thank you What was the expected delivery date before you received the email? yes Do you know the current shipping status of your order? it says that it is en route I apologize for the inconvenience. It seems that the email we sent you was a mistake. Please disregard the email. Your order will arrive within 7 days. That long? Can you express it? Yes, due to the current COVID-19 pandemic, shipping is taking longer than usual. I apologize, but I am unable to change the shipping speed because it's already in transit. That sucks, thanks anyway You are welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with today? nope, thanks Thank you. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello and thank you for contacting us today! How can I help you? I would like to know what the benefits of premium membership Sure I can give you that information. Can I get your name please? David Williams Thank you, David. Let me pull that information up. ok Our members have a wide variety of benefits. All members are invited to our holiday extravaganza each year which comes with an open bar and free flights from anywhere in the United States. Bronze members save on shipping fees and promo codes. Also... Silver members get the previous perks as well as having agents make purchases on their behalf and can cancel orders at any time. Finally... Gold members get unlimited refunds and are always given the benefit of the doubt when doing transactions. Is there any other information I can help you with today? Okay, thank you for all the information you have provided me with That is everything Thank you and have a great day! you too

input: Dialogue: Hi, I am having issues with my cart. Hello. How may I help you today? The cart is not working when I want to purchase an item. Oh I am sorry about that. Let me look into this for you. Please hold. Ok I will wait. So, if I am understanding correctly, the cart does not update when attempting to place an item in it? Correct. Could the item be sold out? Its possible. Are you having this issue with any other items? I have not tried any other items to place in the cart, on the Tommy Hilfiger Boots at $94.00. First can I get you to refresh the page and try adding the item again? Ok did that and still not adding to the cart. How about logging out and signing back in? Let me give it a try. Oh wow it is working now. I can wait while you attempt your purchase to make sure it goes through. Ok I am processing now as it appears in the cart. Wonderful. Is there anything else I can help with? Great it worked and my item is being shipped. Thanks a million, that's all. No problem. Have a great day and thanks for shopping with us.

It's unnerving bcause I see some Jeans I really like but they are listed as OUT OF STOCK. Ugh. I can check that for you. Was it one particular item? Or different items? There are a couple, one are the Calvin Klein Jeans, (64$), and Guess boots, (54$). OK. May I start with your full name or account ID Joyce Wu Is my name. Username: jwu55066 Thanks Joyce. I have sent a note to the purchasing department so this does not happen again. Sorry to unload, It's just that this has happened a couple of times. I guess there isn't anything you can really do. I apologize for this issue. Since you are a valued customer, let me get you a promo code. Ok, That's nice, now I feel bad for complaining. Please use promo code K69JO thanks, again, sorry, and have a good day, goodbye. You're welcome. Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Hi! How can I help you today? Why does this boot is always out of stock? I am waiting for forever. I'm sorry you're having trouble. I will gladly look into this issue for you. Can I first get your full name or account ID? David Williams What is the item that you are trying to purchase? A boot for me, the boot section in general is always out of stock. Oh, so it's a general issue. Okay, I will write up a report to the purchasing department to make them aware of this issue. How long will it take? I can't wait forever. I understand. I can't give you an exact date as to when this issue will be fixed. But they will be working on it immediately. However, I can offer you a promo code for your trouble. Would you like the promo code? Definitely. 9RWII is your promo code. Thanks. Is there anything else I can help you with? That's all! You're welcome! Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Good afternoon, how can I help you today? Yeah, can you tell me any details about these Guess shirts. I can look up information on Guess shirts for you. what were you wanting to know? what type of material are they made of? Our shirt fabrics are 100% natural fibers such as cotton, wool, linen or a blend. Pure cotton is the most popular material and the most popular blend is 90% cotton/10% linen. The label on the collar will indicate the material used. Did that answer your question? Okay there's no way to tell me before I make the purchase? Allergens run in my family Unfortunately there are so many styles of shirts I can't tell you. If you look up the shirt you are interested it may say in the fine print. If not, you can always order it and return it if you are not happy with it.  okay thanks Is there anything else you need help with today? Nope I think that is all. Thanks, have a great day and I hope the shirt will work for you!

input: Dialogue: Hello Can you please help me with something? Hello, how can I help you today? I am waiting on an order I'd love to help you. What are you needing. But the delivery time isn't right Can you help me change it? What makes you think the delivery time isn't right? Well, my job schedule is very intense right now And I'm away a lot I want to make sure that I'm home to receive the order Were you wanting to change when your order is delivered? I am usually available after 7 pm I would like the order to be delivered then Let me pull up your account. What is your full name or account ID? Joseph Banter So were you wanting your package to arrive later than it was supposed to arrive? Yes I think it was originally supposed to come around noon But I won't be home then Alright. I have to verify your identity. Can I get your Account ID and Order ID? N7KU6JNSXU 0720500677 Thanks Joseph. what is the shipping status? I got an email today that said it's in transit I'm really sorry, but since it is already in transit, I can't change the shipping of it. That's disappointing Are you sure that there's nothing you can do? We're having tons of rain right now And if I'm not there to pick up the package, it could be damaged I understand, but it has left the facility so I can not change how it is shipped. All right Well I'll cross my fingers and think positively The packages usually arrive late afternoon so it probably won't be sitting there long. All right If it is damaged please contact us and we will do a return! Okay, I will Sorry I was not more help. Is there anything else I can do for your today? No Thanks Joseph. Have a good day.

input: Dialogue: Good afternoon, how can I help you today? I saw a pair of jeans by michael kors that I really liked, is there a good way to remove grass stains from them? input: Dialogue: I am such an idiot! Please help me! Hello, how can I help you today? I really doubt that. We will work together to fix what is wrong! Name is Sanya Afzal. I ordered earlier today, but I forgot the Michael Kors boots when I was checking out. Can I add them to my existing order now? Let me look in to this for you Sanya. I'll just have to pull your account up. I seriously hope you can help me. I wanna be strutting down Broadway in those boots when this virus thing is over with! We will do everything to make sure you are strutting down Broadway! Can I get your account ID and Order ID? You still with me Sanya? I want to make sure we can get these boots out to you. You'll need to practice strutting in them! You're awesome, thank you. Account ID is POYQOJ0XPC Order ID: 4796276142 Do you have the shipping status? Mmmm, yes. Looks like they're In Transit. Since they are already In Transit I can't add on to your existing order. What is your membership level? Oh MAN! I knew I should have double-checked the order before placing it! I'm Bronze I can either place the order for you now. Or you can go online and order them yourself. I know they will get there in time for you! You have been so helpful, I don't want to put you out anymore. I'll just place another order myself. Sorry I couldn't be more help. But if you order them this month I know you will have them by the time New York opens up again! Have a great evening Sanya!! Here's hoping!

input: Dialogue: Hi! How can I help you? I would like to know more about a product Sure, what product? Product: boots Brand: Michael_Kors what would you like to know? I would like to know how do I remove a paint stain from the shoe sure! first brush off the excess paint then use a rough brush to flake off any dried paint on your boots then make a little soapy water and apply that to where the paint is and that will soften it up you can then scrape off whats left and wash it with detergent last, apply a little nail polish remover and it should be totally clean Okay, thank you for helping me with my question Was there anything else I could assist you with> That is everything Great, good luck getting the paint off those boots! have a good afternoon!

input: Dialogue: hello, how may i be of assistance today? What is your return policy? To clarify, are you asking about our return policy storewide, or about a particular order or item? storewide please I can help you with that, may I ask with whom I am speaking today? Just a first name is fine so long as you are comfortable It is also ok if you do not wish to share Joyce Wu Ok Joyce, I have an answer for you here. I will send a document, but also explain Our return policy is based on membership level (bronze, silver, gold) okay i am a guest gold members are allowed unlimited returns. Silver members are allowed returns on purchases going back 6 months. Lastly Bronze members are allowed reurns on all purchases within the last 90 days As a guest member, you may return any item purchased withing the last 90 days Did you have any further question, or is there anything else I can help you with today? apologies i mistyped that guest members are allowed to refund any purchase within the last 30 days okay thank you! thats all have a good day thanks to you, and have a great day

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may i be of service? Hi there - there's a pair of boots I'm thinking about ordering but I wanted to get some more information first If I understand correctly, you are asking today about a single item (boots), for some more information? Yes, that's right I can definitely help you with that, may i please have your name? Do you need my name? Or rather, do you need my full name? It is not necessary if you do not wish to share, just a pleasantry Ah okay Since you are only inquiring about an Item, there is no need to pull up your account So, what information about our boots were you looking for? Right, I wanted to buy them for my wife and I wanted to know if they were waterproof We have many different design boots, with both waterproof and non-waterproof models that being said most of our boots are waterproof well I'm looking at a pair of Calvin Klein boots the only way to know for sure is to check the guarentee is present and attached upon purchase what guarantee? There should be a guarentee displayed upon adding the item to be purchased, if it is waterproof If it is not waterproof, there will be no guarentee shown the guarentee is for the waterproofing Why doesn't it just say so on the product page? I am not sure. I agree that doesn't make much sense, however, I can file a report with our development team to fix the issue if you wish Yes, you should do that Ok, I have filed that report to our internal team for you just now, they will recieve it shortly and hopefully be able to change the site going forward to show the guarentee more prominently on the page is there anything else I can do to assist you? No that's all thank you for contacting us, and have a nice day

input: Dialogue: Thank you for being an AcmeBrands customer! How may I help you today? hey, quick question for you Sure! I am a bronze member, and I want to buy some stuff, lol But, if I do, I might be a bit late on my subscription payment, will i get in any trouble? the stuff is on sale right now, and i don't want to miss the sale, lol If you are late on your subscription payment, you will be charged a late fee. The fee is $2 per day after the monthly deadline. If you are a gold or silver member, you have a 5 day grace period. can you just waive it for this one sale? What is your membership level? Bronze I'm sorry, I can't waive it. You can still use your membership privileges for the sale, the late fee will be added to your account later. oh, cool... input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme Brands! How can I help you today? Hello. I have an issue with my credit card. I know it's a good card, but you keep rejecting it when I try to make a purchase Can you help me fix this? I'm sorry your having a problem placing your order. I'd be happy to help you. Can you give me your name or account ID? Okay Joseph Banter Joseph, can you try logging out of your account and then back in to see if it will accept the card now? Yes. I can try that I just logged out and then back in, but my card is still being rejected Okay. Delete all of the payment information and then enter it in again. Let me know what happens. Okay give me a moment That didn't work either!! :( Alright. Take a look at your credit card and check the expiration date. It may have expired. Okay.... Oh, I feel so stupid! My card expired in 2019 That's why it's not working I'm so sorry with bothering you with this *for bothering You'll just need to use a different card for your purchase and it should work fine. It's no trouble. I'm happy to help. Is there anything else I can help you with? Okay. I will use another card I don't need anything else. Thanks for your service :) You're welcome! Have a great day! You also

Order ID: 8715951172 and my Account ID: PC7W2EUOVG Thanks, you're all verified.  Can I have the shipping status please? Delivered Oh, then there's no need to get overnight shipping if the product has already been delivered to your house. You should have received your item already.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? I want it upgraded for my next item We can only do overnight shipping for the current order, and it's too late as it's already been delivered.  When you order another item just message us back and we'll be able to upgrade it for the next item. Okay. Thanks so much. You're welcome, hope you have a nice day! And you too.

input: Dialogue: Hello. I have a problem with my promo code Hello, Thank you for reaching out to AcmeBrand today. How may I help you? I got an email from you guys about a great sale and it listed this code But when I try to enter it, it says the code isn't valid Can you help? I see and I'm sorry to hear that. Let's try to check on the promo code. one moment please. Okay Could you provide me with your Full name or Account ID please? Crystal Minh Thank you Crystal. I was able to pull up your account. Okay The majority of our promo codes are good for 7 days but sometimes they may come back with errors. Could you tell me when you received the code? Oh, maybe that's the issue I got the code nine days ago Ah alright that might be why but let me see if I can still help. Could you tell me your membership level? Gold Great let me just do a quick check with the system. It actually looks like your code was one of the ones that is good beyond the 7 day period and it was labelled expired prematurely. Let me issue a new one for you. Oh great The new code for you to use is: NRBJI That would be so nice of you Let me try that new code I just entered it It worked!!! Thank you I'm sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused and glad we were able to get it resolved! Was there anything else I could help you with today? No that was it Thanks for fixing it No problem! Thank you for shopping with us. Have a wonderful day!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme Brands! How can I assist you today? Hi! My account was charged for a subscription and I didn't want to sign up for that. I'm sorry about the billing error. Could I please have your name and account ID? Sure!  Alessandro Phoenix and I actually can't seem to find my account ID Can you look it up by address or something else? That's alright. Let me see if I can pull up your account. Thank you! Yes, I've found it. How did you learn about the billing error? My husband actually told me that he saw it added to the account Okay, give me a moment while I take a look at your account and find the reason. Your husband must have misunderstood the statement. I show that you don't currently have a subscription with us. He may have see the verbage asking for you sign up and the price list. Ah, I see! Very sorry about that! It's no problem. It's better to check on these things. Is there anything else that I can help you with? No, I believe that's it. Thank you again! You're welcome. Enjoy the rest of your day! You as well!

input: Dialogue: Thanmks for contacting AcmeBrands, how can I help? I have a question about some Michael_Kors boots that you have available I see. You would like to something about our boots from Michael Kors. I can help you with that. WHat is your question? I would like to know how to remove a paint stain from the boots OH no sorry! Yes, here is what you need to do. First, brush off the stain using an old toothbrush or something similar THen, apply a soapy mixture to the stain, leaving it a bit until the paint is softer. Scrape off as much of the paint as you can. Then, rub with a detergent solution. FInally, apply nail polish remover to get rid of the remaining stain. Does that answer your question? Yes, thank you. I would also like to know if you have them in wide. You would like to know if we have Michael Kors boots in size wide? yes Do you see that option on our website? no Oh I see. Everything we have is listed on the website. If that is not currently there then we do not have it. However, you could check again at the end of the month, when we refill our stock. Is there anything else I can help you with? OK, the boots are $69, what would be my cost with my silver discount? let me check for you Do you have a promo code? no, thanks, that's all I need I am sorry, are you sure? yes Our silver members get free shipping and promo codes great OK as long as I have answered all of your questions then I will say good-bye bye have a great day!

Ah, I see umm, no I don't think that's necessary. I'll just wait for this one to arrive, and then I'll come back to make the switch Okay great and sorry about that, Is there anything else i can do for you No, that's all I needed.  Thanks so much Okay, have a good day

input: Dialogue: Hi and welcome to AcmeCorp.  How can I help you today? What are the benefits of having a premium membership? Sure, I'll be happy to let your know. You get access to our annual holiday party with an open bar and free flights from anywhere in the USA.  If you're Bronze, you save on shipping fees and you get promo codes. If you're Silver, you get all the previous features of Bronze and can have agents do purchase for you and cancel orders. ok Wild Gold, you get unlimited refunds and always get the benefit of the doubt for any transaction. Is there anything else I can help you with today? No, that answers my questions. I'm thinking about ordering some stuff and was just wondering. Great, I hope you'll become a member in the future.  Hope you have a nice day! thanks

The rest of the site seems fine, if that helps Can you please try logging out of your account and logging back in? I can try it.  One sec Okay, I'll just try another search, but that wheel's still spinning I apologize for the inconvenience, but can you please try clearing your browser's cookies? Oh, that's a good idea umm, I'd probably lose a lot of logins if I did that, but I can definitely try a new browser! lemme just blow the dust off of Internet Explorer...and, there it is the search bar is working now you're right, it must have been an issue with cookies.  Thanks, I would never have thought of that Great. I am glad that we were able to resolve your issue. Thank you for your patience. You are welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with today? No, that was all I needed.  Thanks again Thank you. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hi, I have a question about premium membership. Sure, I can help you with that. What would you like to know about premium membership? If I get it, just how long is it good for? Premium membership lasts until the end of the calendar year in which you received it and the next full calendar year. For example, if you sign up for premium membership on April 1, 2020, your premium membership will last until December 31, 2021. Is there anything else I can help you with today? All right, I guess that's a pretty good deal. Thanks for helping me today. No, that's it. Thank you. Have a great day! You too, bye!

Do you know why the package never came? I'm afraid I don't have that information. Ok, well I guess that's it. Thanks for your help. Thank you.  Have a nice day. input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Can you please explain the levels to me Would you like to know more about membership levels? Yes please Sure, no problem. One moment please. AcmeBrands Membership is a way for us to reward our most valued customers. The membership levels are Bronze, Silver, and Gold. Non-members are considered guests. Ok and do you get special benefits as u go up levels Unlike other companies, we do not use obnoxious titles such as "Platinum" or "Super Exclusive". Yes you do As a member, you will be invited to the annual holiday event with open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US. There are also additional benefits depending on your membership level. Is there any higher than gold? Bronze members receive promo codes and discounts on shipping fees. There is no level higher than gold. Silver members get everything included in Bronze, plus the ability to have agents make purchases for them and to cancel orders at any time. S my questions sOk that answer Gold members get unlimited refunds and will receive more flexible transactions. Is there anything else I can help you with today? Ok thanks. No thank you Thank you. Have a great day!

It looks like the charge is supposed to be there. What's your membership level Alessandro? Guest Got it, thanks. I should only have a charge for $49 for the order. My credit card is showing an extra $40. I think the charge is probably related to an issue we have been having with our supplier, and we've unfortunately had to apply an extra fee to all current orders. I won't be able to remove it, sorry about that. You shouldn't add charges to existing orders, just future orders. I would not have purchased the shirt otherwise. I understand your frustration. Is there anything else I can help you with? I would like to refund the entire order, since its still in the order recieved status. I will need your username, email, and order ID please. aphoenix apoenix@email.com Order ID: 3900929880 I was able to locate your order. The available options for a refund are a gift card, paper check, refund credit card, or adding the value to your account. Which of those do you prefer? Credit card would be great Okay, I will just apply the refund to the card on file. Thank you You're welcome. Based on what you mentioned earlier, is the amount you were charged $89? input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hi. I was wondering how much it would cost to have my name stitched into the white Calvin Klein T-Shirt. Sure. I can look into that for you. thanks How many characters would you have stitched into the shirt? No, 9 I'm sorrry The cost for stitching your name into the shirt will depend on how long your name is, but I'd be happy to calculate that price for you. Great, thank you. So 9 characters long Stitching costs 30 cents per character, so that would $2.70 to stitch 9 characters into the shirt. I'm not sure if I want to do my last name too. Okay, that tells me what I need to know! Thank you. If it is more than 15 characters then the price changes. What does it change to? The next 15 characters after the first 15 will cost 20 cents each, and then 10 cents for any after that. How long is your last name? Does it matter what item I have stitched? It's 7 charachters No, the item doesn't matter. Okay so that will be 30 cents for 15 characters, and then 20 cents for one. That would be $4.70 OK, thank you! That's what I needed to know. Great, can I help with anything else today? No Thank you so much, we appreciate your business. Have a great remainder of the day!

target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how remove a paint stain]
input: Dialogue: Hi, there!  How may I help you today? I bought the boots by michael kors and clumsy me spilled some paint on them is there a good way to get that off? Oh no!  I've done that before, too.  I can help you with that question. Okay, I'm going to give you the exact steps: !.  Brush off the excess paint. 2.  Use a coarse brush or even a toothbrush to flake off the dried excess paint. 3. Apply a soapy mixture to the stain. 4.  Scrape off the softened paint. 5.  Rub with a detergent solution. Lastly, you can try nail polish remover. great thanks for the info You are welcome!  May I answer any more questions for you? that was all thanks and have a good day Have a great day!

Anyway, is there anything else I can help you with? Do they come in different colors Hello, I would have to direct you to our website, as our stock is very dynamic. If you do not see the color you like, I suggest checking back at the end of the month, when we refill the stock That's alright. I actually want it in red if you have it. But if not, I'll get this. input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrand. How may I help you? Hi I'd like to know how much it'd cost to have my name stitched on one of the items I'm thinking of buying. Sure thing.let me pull up that information for you. Alright, Stiching and engraving prices are determined by how much text is being added to the item. Ok my name is Joseph Banter but I'd like Joseph Rainbow Sparkle Banter stitched.  If that's too much, then just Joseph is fine.  I guess. The costs for stitching specifically are 30 cent per character for the first 15 characters, 20 cent for the next, and 10 cent for every character after that. I'll go ahead ad get that number for you if you would like. Excellent, I will get the entire thing stitched then. this is on a per character basis to clarify. Yes I understand So the total for this stitching would be $6.70. Ok great Did you have any other questions for me today? no Thank you for shopping with us, Be safe and have a great day! Thanks

Sanya Afzal Thank you, Sanya. Let me pull that information up quickly. Our official rewards program is known as AcmeBrands Membership. There are three levels which are bronze, silver, and gold. Other customers are just known as guests. Unlike other programs we don't have titles like platinum or super exclusive access. Would you like to know how to qualify for those memberships? can you tell me the benefits of each level? Sure can! All of our members are invited to our holiday gala every year with open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US. Also... Bronze members save on shipping fees and promotion codes. Silver members get all of that PLUS agents can make purchases on their behalf and cancel orders at any time. Gold members get unlimited refunds and will always be given the benefit of the doubt! Is there any other information I can help you with? oh, great! thank you for your help, that's all I needed Thank you and have a great day!

target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how remove a paint stain]
input: Dialogue: Thank you for shopping with AcmeBrands! How may I assist you? Hi, I want to know more about these Tommy Hilfiger boots. Sure! What would you like to know? I want to know how to remove a paint stain from them, I'm a painter by profession. This is a simple process with several steps. First brush off the excess paint. You will need to use a coarse brush or toothbrush to get rid of the dried extra paint. Next, brush on a soapy mixture to the paint. Scrape off the paint after it is softened, then rub it with a solution of detergent and water. The final thing you need to do is put nail polish remover to the paint stain. Does that help? Yes, thank you for the detailed answer. I'll buy these boots then. Great! I know they'll be a good option for you. Is there anything else you need today? That's all, thank you again! You're welcome! Have a wonderful day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? HI! Can you tell me about the membership levels. I am thinking to buy a jacket and I want to make sure the shipping and return will be easy. Of course, let's see what we can find out for you. So the three membership levels are Bronze, Silver and Gold. What are the benefits? Some perks regarding each.  Bronze save on shipping fees and receive promo codes.  Silver receive Bronze benefits plus can have agents make purchases on their behalf.  Finally Gold receive unlimited refunds along with Bronze and Silver benefits. All three tiers are invited to the annual holiday extravaganza with open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US. Does this answer you questions? That is great. I think i will go for bronze. Thank you. Fantastic!  Is there anything else I can help you with today? That's all Thank you Thank you for your interest and you have a wonderful rest of your day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you? Hello. I bought one of your premium subscriptions, wanted to extend it, if possible. I need time to come up with some cash for it. Given my current economic situation Of course! Can I get your full name, account ID, and order ID to verify your identity? Great. My name is Joyce Wu Account id is Q8PZQZZCJG order id is 6815278091 What is your membership level? it is silver can you please help me out How late are you on the payment? About a month I just lost my job because of the global pandemic and i don't know when I'l be able to get unemployment compensation Unfortunately, we are unable to offer you an extension due to your membership level and how far you are behind in payment. However, I will escalate this to my manager for you. Can I get your phone number so they can call you and speak to you about yo ur situation* sure. it is (189) 615-5708 can you recommend anything that I can do on my end to help my case? Yes, I will put in some good words for you. I have notified my manager and they will contact you shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with? no, that is all thank you for your help Have a great day. I hope your situation improves!

Can you please provide me with your full name so that I can pull up your account? Chloe Zhang Thank you, Chloe. While I pull that up, can you please also provide your account ID and order ID? Account 9KTRK0TM94 order 8346882986 Thank you, I've successfully verified your identity! What is your membership level? silver Okay, and when was your payment due? I am not sure, but I am currently having some trouble with my credit card account but I do not want to lose my benefits Okay. input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? hello i want to know what happens if re late on a subscription payment because i thinking of buying stuff. Ok, one moment please. Would you like to know the policy for late payment on subscriptions? yes There is a late fee if you are late on a subscription payment. The fee is $2 per day for each day past the monthly due date. If you are a Gold or a Silver member, you are given a grace period of 5 late days per month, during which late fee will not be applied. Have I answered your question? ok thank you Is there anything else I can help you with today? nothing thanks Thank you. Have a great day!
